Class ViewFacade

java.lang.Object
healthyBites.view.ViewFacade
public class ViewFacade extends Object
The ViewFacade class acts as a single point of entry for the Controller to interact with the entire view component of the application. It manages all the different UI panels using a CardLayout, centralizing navigation and the delegation of UI-related tasks. This simplifies the Controller's logic by abstracting away the complexities of the Swing view hierarchy.
Author:
HealthyBites Team

  • Method Details

    • addMealToHistory

      public void addMealToHistory(Meal meal, Nutrition nutrition)
      Adds a meal to all relevant meal history displays throughout the application.
      Parameters:
      meal - The meal to add.
      nutrition - The nutrition data for the meal.

    • clearMealHistory

      public void clearMealHistory()
      Clears the meal history from all displays.

    • showSwapSelectionPanel

      public void showSwapSelectionPanel()
      Shows the SwapSelectionPanel.

    • setSwapOptions

      public void setSwapOptions(List<FoodItem> options)
      Sets the options to be displayed in the SwapSelectionPanel.
      Parameters:
      options - The list of food items to suggest for a swap.

    • setSwapSelectionListener

      public void setSwapSelectionListener(Consumer<FoodItem> listener)
      Sets the listener for when a swap item is selected.
      Parameters:
      listener - The consumer to handle the selected food item.

    • setSwapSelectionBackButtonListener

      public void setSwapSelectionBackButtonListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the listener for the back button on the SwapSelectionPanel.
      Parameters:
      listener - The action listener for the back button.

    • displaySwapResults

      public void displaySwapResults(Meal originalMeal, Meal modifiedMeal, Map<FoodItem,FoodItem> replacements, Map<String,Double> originalNutrients, Map<String,Double> modifiedNutrients, Map<String,String> nutrientUnits)
      Displays the results of a food swap in the GoalPanel2.
      Parameters:
      originalMeal - The meal before the swap.
      modifiedMeal - The meal after the swap.
      replacements - A map of original food items to their replacements.
      originalNutrients - The original nutritional data.
      modifiedNutrients - The new nutritional data.
      nutrientUnits - The units for each nutrient.

    • setGoalPanel2BackButtonListener

      public void setGoalPanel2BackButtonListener(ActionListener listener)
      Parameters:

    • displaySwapVisualization

      public void displaySwapVisualization(Map<String,Double> originalData, Map<String,Double> modifiedData, Map<String,String> nutrientUnits, String title, CFGFoodGroup recommendedServings)
      Prepares and displays the swap visualization panel with what-if analysis data.
      Parameters:
      originalData - A map of the original nutrient or serving data.
      modifiedData - A map of the modified nutrient or serving data.
      nutrientUnits - A map of nutrient names to their units.
      title - The title for the visualization.
      recommendedServings - The CFG recommended servings, used by the CFG strategy.

    • displaySwapVisualizationWithContext

      public void displaySwapVisualizationWithContext(Map<String,Double> originalData, Map<String,Double> modifiedData, Map<String,String> nutrientUnits, String title, CFGFoodGroup recommendedServings, SwapVisualizationPanel.VisualizationContext context)
      Prepares and displays the swap visualization panel with context-aware settings.
      Parameters:
      originalData - A map of the original nutrient or serving data.
      modifiedData - A map of the modified nutrient or serving data.
      nutrientUnits - A map of nutrient names to their units.
      title - The title for the visualization.
      recommendedServings - The CFG recommended servings, used by the CFG strategy.
      context - The visualization context (time series or aggregate).

    • setVisualizationData
